name: Spectare
description:
Move — Left/right arrow keys or A/D keys
Jump — Spacebar, hold to jump higher
(gamepads maybe supported, depending on your browser/device/planetary alignment)

Made for the B&W Jam. Title theme is an arrangement of a Bach piece (BWV 974, which is I think in turn an arrangement of on oboe concerto). Sound effects from The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection by Juhani Junkala.
